text: Anyone tried to write Julia servers with JSON-RPC <https://github.com/julia-vscode/JSONRPC.jl> ?

elements.text: Anyone tried to write Julia servers with JSON-RPC

text: I mean, how can we combine JSONRPC.jl with http-servers or websocket-servers from HTTP.jl?
